title: Step-by-step instructions
pageDescription: Standard operations for managing SaaS and image-based services of the VK Cloud marketplace.
shortDescription: Connecting services in your personal account and managing service instances
metaDescription: Marketplace VK Cloud: standard operations for managing SaaS and image-based services
markdown: How to connect the service from the app store and how to manage service instances via [personal account](https://msk.cloud.vk.com/app/en/) VK Cloud. The initial configuration of specific services is described in the section [Configuring Marketplace services](/en/vendors-products/marketplace/initial-configuration)
